subject: [Q] Using "golden files" with JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to figure out how to use a golden file along with JUnit. The basic idea is to create a golden file. Then run a JUnit test that should ideally
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to figure out how to use a "golden file"
along with JUnit. The basic idea is to create a golden
file. Then run a JUnit test that should ideally produce
the same output file.

I am trying to find out whether there is a library somewhere
that provides an assertFile() method.

Would appreciatte your help on this.

Regagrds

- SD
